name: ARKHAM HAUNTED
description:
Dark and mysterious journey in the land of lights and shadows.

Remember that time is quantised. They are after you and follow after each of your step forward.

So get a gun and find those statues.

Controls :
Move Forward: W
Turn right: D
Turn left: A
Next item: E
Previous Item: Q

Use item: Left mouse click (must select a target)
Use gun to shoot enemies, use magnifying glass to click on object to find clues.

Game by:
Andrei Tochilkin & Varvara Dubrovskaia 

Known Issues:
Walking to bushed causes critical Movement bug.
